results.name: a(n) = n^2 + 10.
comment: Conjecture: n^2 + 10 != x^k for all n,x, and k>1.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
mathematica: a[n_]:=n^2+10; a[Range[200]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 20 2011*)
